definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: The exaggerated bosom ornament, big black feathers joss-stick shoulder white dew.
sentences.chinese: 胸前點綴誇張的黑色羽毛，大露雪白香肩。

sentences.english: The pain may also be felt beneath the precordium.
sentences.chinese: 也可在胸前區下方有疼痛感覺。

sentences.english: Silver Wings upon their chest, These are men, America's best.
sentences.chinese: 胸前別著銀色的傘徽，他們是吾國最精銳的勁旅。

sentences.english: She pressed her child to her heart.
Your name badge is placed on your left side, close to your lapel.
sentences.chinese: 顯示名字的胸卡應放在胸前靠左邊的位置。

sentences.english: The gondoliers wore green and white livery and silver plaques on their chest.
sentences.chinese: 船伕們穿着白綠兩色的制服，胸前彆着銀質徽章。
母親節那天，在胸前佩戴石竹花。

sentences.english: Then I lay down again, feeling the cobbles harder than ever against my chest.
sentences.chinese: 然後再趴下，胸前石子兒的硬度更勝從前。

sentences.english: His beard fell to his chest.
With legs slightly down, raising his glass to his chest.
sentences.chinese: 說着雙腿微跪，酒杯舉到戰友胸前。

sentences.english: I'd strap him to my chest and go to a ball game.
sentences.chinese: 我把他綁在我的胸前，一起去看棒球賽。

sentences.english: He crossed himself as he passed the church.
sentences.chinese: 他經過教堂時用手在胸前畫十字。

sentences.english: Chest a falbala, a word, condole belt is adjustable.
sentences.chinese: 胸前有一片荷葉邊，一字領，吊帶可調節。

sentences.english: Adorning the Jin Dashan of milistary exploit chapter is demobilized from army before the bosom, returned home town.
sentences.chinese: 胸前佩戴着軍功章的金大山從部隊復員，回到了家鄉。

sentences.english: He was past sixty and had a long white beard curling down over his chest.
sentences.chinese: 他已年過六旬，銀白色蜷曲的長髯披掛胸前。

sentences.english: Her unbuttoned jacket opened to show two huge pendulous breasts.
sentences.chinese: 小棉襖本沒扣著，胸前露出一對極長極大的奶來。

definition: the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
